text: kafaar quraysh hum aladhin jahaduu tawhid allh, wsddukm yawm "alhdyby" ean dukhul almasjid alhram, wmneu alhdy, whbswh 'an yablugh mahala nhrh, wahu alhrm. walawla rijal muwminun mustadeafun wanisa' muwminat bayn 'azhar hwla' alkafirin b "mk", yaktumun 'iimanuhum khifatan ealaa 'anfusahum lm terfwhm; khashyat 'ana ttwwhm bjyshkm ftqtlwhm, fysybkm bdhlk alqatl 'iithm weyb wghramt bighayr elm, lknna sllatnakm elyhm; liyudkhil allah fi rahmatih man yasha' fyamunn ealayhim bial'iiman baed alkfr, law tmyaz hwla' almuminun walmuminat ean mshrky "mk" wkhrju min bynhm, ledhdhabna aladhin kafaruu wkdhdhabu minhum edhabana mwlmana mwjeana
